title: Annual audit or financial review
context: ยง302D-32 Annual audit or financial review. Each charter school shall annually complete an independent financial audit that complies with the requirements of its authorizer and the department; provided that the authorizer shall have the discretion to allow a financial review in lieu of an independent financial audit. [L 2013, c 159, pt of ยง1; am L 2014, c 99, ยง22]
